elements.title: Fernbrook Farms (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Fernbrook Farms (pictured) was once a model breeding farm named New Warlaby?

elements.title: Pier Giorgio Morandi (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Pier Giorgio Morandi first played as the principal oboist at La Scala in Milan, and conducted a 2019 recorded production of Verdi's Il trovatore at the Verona Arena, directed by Franco Zeffirelli?

elements.title: her murder (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Alexis Sharkey's last Instagram post before her murder documented her travels to Tulum, Mexico?

elements.title: Dolmelynllyn Estate (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that politician William Madocks built a privy in the shape of "an old broken tower" on his Dolmelynllyn Estate in Wales?

elements.title: Artemy Vedel (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the choral music of Artemy Vedel, who is regarded as one of the Golden Three composers of 18th-century Ukrainian classical music, was censored but performed from handwritten copies?

elements.title: Prabhudas Gandhi (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Prabhudas Gandhi invented an innovative foot-driven spinning wheel and named it "Magan Charkha" in memory of his uncle Maganlal Gandhi?

elements.title: in an effort to overturn the 2020 United States presidential election (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Donald Trump and his attorneys John Eastman and Rudy Giuliani spoke to some 300 Republican state legislators in an effort to overturn the 2020 United States presidential election?

elements.title: Surprise (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that "Surprise" by Chloe Bailey was hand-picked by Beyoncé?
